instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the performance of the deep learning model in predicting soil properties from spectral data?

instruction: What machine learning approaches were explored in the paper for predicting soil properties from spectral data in the analysis of soil profiles using proximal sensor technologies?
Output: The paper explores various machine learning and deep learning approaches for predicting soil properties from spectral data in the analysis of soil profiles using proximal sensor technologies. instruction: How does the RDNet deep learning model compare to traditional methods in predicting soil properties from Vis-NIR spectra in the analysis of soil profiles using proximal sensor technologies?
